modifier.etstlib.anti_stun_glasses.descr: Cancel hurt shaking and field of view effect.Immune to nausea effect.
modifier.etstlib.energy_shield.descripti: Blocks damage using FE,drains 10kFE per damage.If energy storage from one armor is not sufficient,then consume 2x energy from all the armor containing this modifier to cancel damage.
modifier.etstlib.energy_loaded.descripti: Your tool consumes energy instead of durability when is powered.
modifier.etstlib.applied_fixing.descript: Self-repairs when placed inside AE2 charger.
modifier.etstlib.atomic_decompose.descri: Fix your mining speed to your tool's mining speed.Ignores harvest tier.
modifier.etstlib.aerial_reinforced.descr: Boosts attack speed,attack damage,arrow speed,armor,armor toughness and knockback resistance.Consume air instead of durability on use.
modifier.etstlib.clearing.description: Immune to wither and poison effect.
modifier.etstlib.energetic_attack.descri: Deals extra magic damage on full charge attack.
modifier.etstlib.radiation_inflict.descr: Inflicts 100mSv radiation on full charge attack.
modifier.etstlib.momentum_accelerate.des: -20% Attack speed and mining speed but speeds up when constantly using.
